choices.D: Right click on the Task number and select the Assign to me option in the menu
choices.A: Select the record using the check box, then select the Person icon
choices.C: Double click on the Assigned to value, type the name of the user, and select the green check
choices.E: Select the Task number, and select the Assign to me UI action on the form
choices.B: Select the record using the check box then select the Assign To Me UI action on the List Header

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C and D are the correct answers.

Selected Answer: CD
C and D are correct

comments.content: which answer for the community or the exam.

questions.question_text: If users would like to locate and assign a task to themselves in the Platform, what action could they perform from the list view to make the assignment? (Choose two.)
What module enables an administrator to define destinations for imported data on any ServiceNow table?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
I agree with D, Transform Map

questions.question_text: Which ServiceNow capability provides assistance to help users obtain information, make decisions, and perform common work tasks via a messaging interface?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D - is a messaging interface that allows users to get info.

questions.question_text: What instance resource allows you to access guided tours, information about actions, and instructions on how to use inputs and outputs in your flow?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D - correct as it's an instance resource. Now Support, Community, Docs are not instance resources.

Selected Answer: D
D - Transform Map. Field Alignment isn't an option.

Duplicate of Q227. Answer should be Field Mapping. But we dont have that option.
So its D because Transform Map is a set of field maps

questions.question_text: When importing data from a spreadsheet, which step defines where the incoming data columns will be written in the receiving table?
